2024.title: React 18
2024.description: The dominant UI library for building component-based interfaces with concurrent rendering, server components, and enhanced suspense features. Enables highly interactive applications with optimized performance.

2024.title: Vue 3
2024.description: Progressive framework featuring Composition API, optimized reactivity system, and improved TypeScript support. Ideal for building scalable applications with gradual adoption.

2024.title: Angular 17
2024.description: Enterprise-grade framework with signals-based reactivity, standalone components, and enhanced server-side rendering. Offers comprehensive tooling for complex applications.

2024.title: Next.js 14
2024.description: Full-stack React framework with app router, server actions, and static site generation. Simplifies building SEO-friendly hybrid applications with optimized performance.

2024.title: SvelteKit 2
2024.description: Compiler-based framework generating optimized vanilla JS with zero virtual DOM overhead. Features seamless transitions, stores, and server-side rendering.

2024.title: TypeScript 5.4
2024.description: Strongly typed JavaScript superset with improved inference, new utility types, and enhanced editor tooling. Essential for scalable application development.

2024.title: Tailwind CSS v4
2024.description: Utility-first CSS framework with zero-runtime engine, improved theming, and CSS-native implementation. Enables rapid UI development with design system constraints.

2024.title: Vite 5
2024.description: Next-gen build tool with instant server start, optimized production builds, and framework-agnostic architecture. Supports React, Vue, Svelte, and Lit out-of-the-box.

2024.title: Astro 4
2024.description: Islands architecture framework for content-rich sites with partial hydration and view transitions API. Ships minimal JavaScript by default.

2024.title: Remix 2
2024.description: Full-stack framework with nested routing, optimistic UI, and built-in data mutations. Simplifies complex data loading and form handling patterns.

2024.title: Qwik 2
2024.description: Resumable framework delivering instant-load applications through fine-grained lazy loading and serializable state. Optimized for O(1) scalability.

2024.title: Zustand
2024.description: Minimal state management solution with atomic updates, middleware support, and zero boilerplate. Provides React context alternatives without re-renders.

2024.title: TanStack Query
2024.description: Data synchronization library for server-state management with caching, background updates, and declarative APIs. Simplifies data fetching in React/Vue/Solid.

2024.title: Storybook 8
2024.description: UI component workshop with automated testing, accessibility checks, and visual regression tools. Facilitates component-driven development workflows.

2024.title: Cypress 13
2024.description: End-to-end testing framework with real-time reloads, time travel debugging, and component testing. Ensures reliable testing for modern web applications.

2024.title: Playwright 1.40
2024.description: Cross-browser testing library supporting Chromium, WebKit and Firefox with single API. Features auto-waiting, network interception, and mobile emulation.

2024.title: Vitest 1
2024.description: Blazing-fast test runner built on Vite with ESM-first architecture, Jest-compatible API, and built-in coverage. Optimized for modern web projects.

2024.title: ESBuild
2024.description: Extremely fast JavaScript bundler written in Go with 10-100x speed gains over traditional tools. Enables near-instant builds for development workflows.

2024.title: Turbopack
2024.description: Incremental bundler optimized for monorepos with Rust-based architecture. Powers Next.js 13+ builds with significant performance improvements over traditional bundlers like Webpack.

2024.title: GraphQL
2024.description: Query language for APIs enabling declarative data fetching with single endpoints. Reduces over-fetching while providing strong typing and introspection.

2024.title: WebAssembly 2.0
2024.description: Binary instruction format enabling near-native performance in browsers. Supports languages like Rust/C++ for compute-intensive tasks.

2024.title: Three.js r160
2024.description: WebGL-based 3D library with physics engines, VR support, and declarative scene graphs. Powers interactive web-based visualizations.

2024.title: D3.js 7
2024.description: Data visualization library combining SVG, Canvas, and HTML5 with declarative data binding. Creates complex interactive charts and custom diagrams.

2024.title: Redux Toolkit 2
2024.description: Official opinionated Redux setup with simplified store configuration, immutable updates, and built-in async handling. Reduces Redux boilerplate significantly.

2024.title: Jotai 2
2024.description: Atomic state management with React Suspense support and zero-config approach. Scales from simple to complex state needs with minimal API surface.

2024.title: Zod 3
2024.description: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference and composable schemas. Ensures runtime safety with developer-friendly syntax.

2024.title: Shadcn UI
2024.description: Accessible component library built on Radix UI with Tailwind CSS styling. Features customizable unstyled components for design systems.

2024.title: Panda CSS
2024.description: CSS-in-JS alternative generating static CSS at build time. Features type-safe styles, design tokens, and variant-based utilities.

2024.title: Bun 1.1
2024.description: All-in-one JavaScript runtime with built-in bundler, test runner, and Node.js-compatible APIs. Offers significantly faster performance than Node.js.

2024.title: Deno 1.40
2024.description: Secure runtime for JavaScript/TypeScript with built-in tooling and Web-standard APIs. Features permissions system and native ES modules.

2024.title: Tauri 2
2024.description: Desktop app framework creating lightweight binaries with Rust backend and web frontend. Produces significantly smaller bundles than Electron.

2024.title: WASM-Pack
2024.description: Workflow tool for Rust-generated WebAssembly with npm compatibility. Simplifies building and publishing WASM libraries.
